languages.text: "Иди, Пасынок Империума. Стань костьми, которые лягут в основу новой правды".
languages.translation_comment: Капитан Вальц. После барка Новобранец отходит, стартует диалог TW_ImperialGuardLeader_dialogue

languages.text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."
languages.original_text: "Иди, Пасынок Империума. Стань костьми, которые лягут в основу новой правды".

traits.locale_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."
"Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."
"Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."
"Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."
"Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."
"Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

languages.text: «Ve, hijastro del Imperium. Tus huesos serán los cimientos de la nueva verdad».
languages.original_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

traits.locale_text: «Ve, hijastro del Imperium. Tus huesos serán los cimientos de la nueva verdad».

languages.text: “去吧，帝国的继子！成为全新真理的支柱吧。”
languages.original_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

traits.locale_text: “去吧，帝国的继子！成为全新真理的支柱吧。”

languages.text: 「帝国の連れ子よ、行け。新たな真実の礎の骨となれ」
languages.original_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の連れ子よ、行け。新たな真実の礎の骨となれ」

languages.text: "Geh, Stiefkind des Imperiums. Mögen deine Knochen das Fundament einer neuen Wahrheit sein."
languages.original_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

traits.locale_text: "Geh, Stiefkind des Imperiums. Mögen deine Knochen das Fundament einer neuen Wahrheit sein."

languages.text: « Va, enfant de l'Imperium. Puissent tes ossements servir de fondations à la vérité nouvelle. »
languages.original_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

traits.locale_text: « Va, enfant de l'Imperium. Puissent tes ossements servir de fondations à la vérité nouvelle. »

languages.text: "Git bakalım İmparatorluk'un Üvey Evladı. Yeni gerçeğin temelinde yatan kemiklere dönüş."
languages.original_text: "Go, Stepchild of the Imperium. Become bones in the foundation of the new truth."

traits.locale_text: "Git bakalım İmparatorluk'un Üvey Evladı. Yeni gerçeğin temelinde yatan kemiklere dönüş."
